title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When creating two projects, P1 and P2, and selecting P2 and closing it, the option to open/close a project is not always available in the Navigator.
EB: The option to open/close a project should always be available in the Navigator when a project is selected.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2
2. Select P2
3. Close P2
4. Check if the option to open/close a project is available in the Navigator
